children.text: Sulit pagkabili, fast printing pero mahal sobra ng catriage .. Walang refill. Nahihirapan ako humanap ng replacement ink
Where Can I buy a ink for this?

Hello,

I got this printer and it was a good save. My concern though is I cant find a place where I can buy inks for it.

Someone please help me. lol.

Thanks

printer is cheap but ink costs too much.. hp printer cant even set to ciss.. bought the printer for only 800+ but standard colored ink will cost 980 plus delivery thru hp store. just throw it and buy a new one.
